verses.name: Acts 9:29
verses.text: And he spake boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus, and disputed against the Grecians: but they went about to slay him.

verses.name: Acts 9:30
verses.text: Which when the brethren knew, they brought him down to Cesarea, and sent him forth to Tarsus.

verses.name: Acts 9:31
verses.text: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judea and Galilee and Samaria, and were edified; and walking in the fear of the Lord, and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost, were multiplied.

verses.name: Acts 9:32
verses.text: And it came to pass, as Peter passed throughout all quarters, he came down also to the saints which dwelt at Lydda.
